bibl.title: Between High and Low. A Chronology of the Early Hellenistic Period. (Oikumene. Studien zur antiken Weltgeschichte. 5.)
bibl.note: Introduction. - 1. Sources with chronological information - A survey [including Greek inscriptions and papyri]. - 2. A political history from Alexander the Great until the Successor Kings. A relative chronological survey of events. - 3. A reconstruction of the chronological framework [see in part. pp. 89-90: In Egypt]. - 4. Political history of the early Hellenistic period after Alexander's death in its chronological perspective. - Conclusion. - Bibliography. Indices.
BOIY Tom, Between High and Low. A Chronology of the Early Hellenistic Period. (Oikumene. Studien zur antiken Weltgeschichte. 5.)
Frankfurt am Main, Verlag Antike, 2007, 8°, 175 pp., tabl. ISBN 978-3-938032-20-6. €29,90.
